Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Wolfram syndrome ( WFS ; OMIM 222300 ) is an autosomal recessive neurodegenerative disorder defined by young - onset non - immune insulin - dependent diabetes mellitus and progressive optic atrophy .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Wolfram syndrome |
| Autosomal recessive neurodegenerative disorder |
| Young-onset non-immune insulin-dependent diabetes mellitus |
| Progressive optic atrophy |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Wolfram syndrome (WFS) |
| Autosomal recessive neurodegenerative disorder |
| Young-onset non-immune insulin-dependent diabetes mellitus |
| Progressive optic atrophy |

Note: "WFS" and "OMIM 222300" are not diseases, but rather an acronym and a reference number for Wolfram syndrome in the Online Mendelian Inheritance in Man database, respectively. They have been removed from the table.
